product_name: Garmin VIRB Vented Helmet Strap Mount
long_description: Use the Garmin VIRB vented helmet strap mount to securely attach your Garmin VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to your vented helmet and capture your entire adventure. Use the vents in your helmet to attach this adjustable strap mount and lock your camera firmly in place. Interlocking joints provide durable, anti-vibration locking performance by gripping in place instead of relying solely on tension.
short_description: Use the Garmin VIRB vented helmet strap mount to securely attach your Garmin VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to your vented helmet and capture your entire adventure.
